method.name: getDestinationDir
method.description:
Returns the output directory that processed JavaScript is written to.

returns:The output directory.

method.name: getForkOptions
method.description:
The fork options to be applied to the JavaScript compiler.

returns:The fork options for the JavaScript compiler.

method.name: getToolChain
method.description:
Returns the tool chain that will be used to compile the JavaScript source.

returns:The tool chain.

method.name: setDestinationDir
method.description:
Sets the output directory where processed JavaScript should be written.
param:destinationDir The output directory.

method.name: setPlayPlatform
method.description:
Sets the target Play platform.
param:playPlatform The target Play platform.

property.name: destinationDir
property.description:
Returns the output directory that processed JavaScript is written to.

returns:The output directory.

property.name: forkOptions
property.description:
The fork options to be applied to the JavaScript compiler.

returns:The fork options for the JavaScript compiler.

property.name: playPlatform
property.description:
Sets the target Play platform.
param:playPlatform The target Play platform.

property.name: toolChain
property.description:
Returns the tool chain that will be used to compile the JavaScript source.

returns:The tool chain.
